description: Detects creation of cron files or files in Cron directories. Potential persistence. Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research), MSTIC. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Cron Files
query: (file.path:(\/etc\/cron.d\/* OR \/etc\/cron.daily\/* OR \/etc\/cron.hourly\/* OR \/etc\/cron.monthly\/* OR \/etc\/cron.weekly\/* OR \/var\/spool\/cron\/crontabs\/*) OR file.path:(*\/etc\/cron.allow* OR *\/etc\/cron.deny* OR *\/etc\/crontab*))
